headline: Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Applied Materials, Inc. on Uncle Stock Notes’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AMAT. Applied Materials, Inc.’s share was trading at $341.34 as of January 29th. AMAT’s trailing and forward P/E were 38.89 and 34.97 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Applied Materials (AMAT) After Its 80% One Year Surge?
summary: Wondering if Applied Materials at around US$318 per share is still priced for opportunity or already reflecting the good news? This article walks through what the current market price might be implying about future expectations. The stock has seen some sharp moves recently, with a 4.2% decline over the last 7 days, a 18.5% return over the last 30 days, and a 80.3% return over the last year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 171.6% and 215.8% respectively. Those swings can change how...
